title: Uncovering Shane’s Ghost of Christmas Past
itunes:title: Uncovering Shane’s Ghost of Christmas Past
description:
PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey

Produced by Melisa D. Monts and Diamond MPrint Productions

Edited by Diane Kang 

 

Leisha makes a country club friend at The Chicks concert. Kate thinks Philadelphia is an underrated city. Leisha completely forgets the plot of every classic Christmas film but luckily Kate’s there to remind her. 

 

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Follow us on Instagram @ThePantsPod

Email us: kateandleisha@gmail.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
